t: Cooking Series ‘Dish It Out’ Starring Gordon Ramsay’s Daughter Tilly Set At Amazon As Part Of First-Look Deal With Tastemade
s: January 17, 2024 - Matilda “Tilly” Ramsay, daughter of Gordon Ramsay, is to host a cooking show for Amazon. She is hosting Dish It Out, the first of 15 shows being brought to Prime Video and Freevee over the next few years as part of a first-look deal with Tastemade.
